title.narrative: CAPACITY OF NATIONAL SYSTEMS TO SCALE UP QUALITY NUTRITION-SENSITIVE INTERVENTION

description.narrative: Capacity of national systems to scale up quality nutrition-sensitive interventions is strengthened, which contributes to Early Detection And Treatment Of Malnutrition, Nutrition In Early Childhood, Nutrition Of Adolescents And Women. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Children under 5, pregnant and lactating women, and adolescents have access to and utilize quality and effective nutrition services, and adopt improved nutrition practices

participating-org.narrative: NATIONAL CHILD DEVELOPMENT AGENCY TUBARERE MUMURYANGO PROGRAMME

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Capacity of national systems to scale up quality nutrition-sensitive interventions is strengthened

description.narrative: UNICEF supported the Government to develop and implement strategies for nutrition-sensitive interventions. The focus was put on agriculture interventions for increased production of nutritious and diversified foods, and social protection interventions aimed at increasing household wellness and resilience through increased access to savings and loan services. UNICEF continued its technical and financial support for modelling child-and nutrition-sensitive social protection activities, as well as supporting the national systems to integrate and scale up tested models at a wider scale. National capacity was also increased through development of national guidelines including the national kitchen garden package and VSLA training package.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2021

title.narrative: Proportion of targeted households with children under 2 participating in nutrition-sensitive savings and lending groups, Text
